long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is used for auto invigilation of recruitment tests attempted by candidates from remote locations. The tests are administered through applicant.geeekassess.com . Before starting the test, the candidate has to allow webcam capture and screen capturing so that the system can check for any kind of violations by the candidate while attempting the test. This extension is exclusively made for use by the portal applicant.geeekassess.com. The parent website is www.geekqs.com.
